TEXT.TITLE: BRUNSWICK CORP <BC> SELLS NOTES AT 8.199 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Brunswick Corp is raising 100 mln dlrs through an offering of notes due 1997 yielding 8.199 pct, lead manager Shearson Lehman Brothers Inc said. The notes have an 8-1/2 pct coupon and were priced at 99.50 to yield 96 basis points over comparable Treasury securities. The issue is non-callable for life and rated Baa-1 by Moody's Investors Service Inc and BBB-plus by Standard and Poor's Corp. Salomon Brothers co-managed the deal. Reuter
